channel.title: Major help me me!
channel.description: i am hosting my server ~@~@~FUN3SCAPE~@~@~ but it cant handle like 1000 ppl logging in. i put the server up on server status and its the first server. Can any1 tell me how i can make my server hold over 100 ppl? by the way im a total java n00b...

item.title: Major help me me!
item.dc:creator: @Sane Sane
item.description:
@Sane wrote:

go into server.java ( you kno the one that looks nice a notepad)

Then ctrl+F find maxconnections
if you cant find that fine maxcon

And change the number to the right of it it should look like this.

Maxconnections = 10000;

Change the number to 100

Read full topic
